Description:
Hidden Gem
Hidden behind the beautiful Italianate facade of the original Collingwood Post Office (circa 1891) is this private and quiet 1 bedroom apartment. Generous in size this wonderful apartment is soaked in natural light with a sensational alfresco balcony great for enjoying with friends and family. Large open plan living/dining area, funky stone kitchen with stainless steel appliances, generous light filled bedroom (BIR's), sleek bathroom and euro laundry and being much larger than expected all add up to make this one great home. This apartment offers the best of both worlds, allowing you to enjoy the cosmopolitan lifestyle that Smith St has to offer on your doorstep, while being able to come home and be securely tucked away behind this magnificent building with secure intercom entry and basement parking with lift access. The ultimate lifestyle with cafes, the nightlife and the city tram at your doorstep.
-Superb location
-Generous size
-Heritage facade
-Great balcony and outlook
-Sunny and bright
-Secure entry, and basement garaging.
For one lucky purchaser the search will be over, this is a must inspect.
Insights: 25/176 Smith Street, COLLINGWOOD VIC 3066 was last sold in 2013 and 49 other 1 bedroom unit in COLLINGWOOD have recently been sold.

Description:
Raw & Ready To Go!
You asked for it and now we have it! An affordable warehouse shell (76sqm approx) positioned amongst the ever changing face of Collingwood. Use your imagination to create your own individualised work space/residence (STCA) in one of Melbourne's hippest suburbs. Stroll to a vast array of galleries, boutiques, cafes, CBD transport and parkland. (NB Zoning: Commercial 1)
Open For Inspections:
Thursday 10/10/2013 from 5:30-6pm
Saturday 12/10/2013 from 10am
Leonard Siragusa : 0407 875 048

Description:
VICTORIAN BEAUTY IN A PRIME INNER-CITY LOCATION
An instantly enjoyable period classic, this handsome 3BR balconied terrace presents an exciting opportunity to secure your future in one of Collingwood's most attractive tree-lined streetscapes. Tastefully updated and perfectly-presented throughout, the home's versatile floorplan highlights two large upstairs bedrooms - both with BIRs and two-way access into the central bathroom, front balcony with glimpses of the city skyline. Downstairs: third bedroom with robes, second bathroom, spacious central lounge through to the dining area and contemporary-style kitchen complete with dishwasher and stainless steel cooking appliances. Other features of the home include gas heating, open fireplaces, plus a delightful north-facing backyard garden complete with brick-paved entertaining area, established palm trees and off-street parking (via Bendigo Street). Spacious, serene and brilliantly positioned, it's close to cafes and restaurants, trams and trains to the CBD.
Insights: 24 other 3 bedroom house in COLLINGWOOD have recently been sold.

Description:
AUCTION THIS SATURDAY - View from 10.15am
If you're looking for an immaculately maintained town residence with a flexible floor plan offering both space and the opportunity of working from home or entertaining friends ... look no further.
Prominently positioned on the corner of this modern complex the residence is built over 4 levels with an entertainment room at basement level providing direct access to the 2 car spaces. An entry foyer with generous bedroom and ensuite at street level, open plan lounge/ dining with adjoining entertainers kitchen all opening to a sunny balcony, plus a guest bathroom and European laundry and either a formal sitting/dining room or third bedroom on the first level.
The upper level comprises the main bedroom with ensuite and great views across the district.
Quality fixtures and fittings are provided throughout with neutral decor offset by the warmth of timber floors and the corner location allows natural light to stream throughout the home.
Harrington Earl E-Book
http://bit.ly/GzNVLR
Internal area
157m²

Description:
SUPERBLY LOCATED WAREHOUSE SPACE - ADD VALUE HERE!
This expansive warehouse offers an exciting opportunity to reconfigure and refit in the heart of the historic Foy and Gibson precinct, just around the corner from Collingwood's vibrant cafe scene. Liveable in its present condition, it offers a vast living/dining zone open to a timber kitchen, big loft-style bedroom with powder room, a bathroom and separate laundry. Featuring Baltic pine floors, recycled detail and soaring ceilings, this potential-packed property includes designated garaging. Securely leased until March 2014.

Description:
Contemporary Living in Lifestyle Location
This impressive contemporary townhouse is situated in a highly prized Collingwood location moments from the cafes, restaurants, shops and amenities of Smith and Brunswick Streets. Featuring three bedrooms including master with WIR and ensuite and second bedroom with BIR, this home enjoys an abundance of natural light due to clever design. The spacious modern open plan kitchen, meals and living area, featuring polished timber floors, Smeg stovetop and oven, stainless steel bench top and breakfast bar, flows seamlessly through sliding doors onto the attractive tiled balcony. In addition this residence enjoys the convenience of internal access to a lock up double garage, secure entry with intercom system, alarm, heating and cooling and Euro style laundry. Easy access to the city, freeway and several transport options means you will be able to fully enjoy the lifestyle benefits afforded by the location.
Insights: 18 other 3 bedroom unit in COLLINGWOOD have recently been sold.

Description:
A LIFESTYLE YOU WILL WANT!
This quality light-filled Victorian home offers a stylish and affordable inner city lifestyle in a popular residential location close to many inner city attractions including cafes, transport & the Smith Street restaurant precinct. Its instantly appealing interior highlights 2 large bedrooms, open plan kitchen and adjacent dining with a central light court, central bathroom (bath) & laundry, full width living room with walls of glass overlooking a private north facing brick paved courtyard garden (ROW) ideal for relaxing or entertaining. Other features include high ceilings with high light windows, natural light, built in robes & heating/cooling. This impressive home is sure to appeal to first home buyers, young couples & investors alike. Take a look!

Description:
LIGHT AND BRIGHT INNER-CITY LIVING!
With its clever design, updated features and convenient location, this freestanding period home presents an exciting opportunity for young professionals and savvy investors alike. Well-presented inside and out, the home's spotless interior comprises two large bedrooms and stylish bathroom, lounge and dining areas, quality kitchen with dishwasher, separate laundry, separate toilet. Other highlights include gas heating, high ceilings and polished timber floors, north-facing courtyard with decking. In a quiet and convenient city-edge location, it's within easy walking distance to Smith Street shops, cafes and restaurants, trams and trains to the CBD.

Description:
LIVE & WORK
Located in the heart of Collingwood, this boom-style Victorian terrace boasts a spacious commercial area plus a substantial residence, with most of the hard work done. Features include:
> Excellent natural light
> High ceilings
> Period features throughout
> Baltic pine floors
> Period shopfront
> Commercial & residential tenancies separately metered

As Good as Gold....
When it comes to easy low maintenance living this top floor, light filled corner apartment is as straight forward as it gets. Offering a great opportunity for entry level investment or lifestyle the apartment is located in a great inner city location with all manner of retail, cafes, restaurants, public transport situated in nearby proximity. Comprises one bedroom, ensuite bathroom off the main bedroom, light filled living, kitchen area and OSP. Moments from Smith, Gertrude, & Brunswick St with Queens Parade, Eastlink and CBD access all close by. Note: low outgoings and body corporate fees.
Agent - hockingstuart.

Description:
QUALITY FIRST FLOOR CONTEMPORARY APARTMENT FLOODED WITH NORTH LIGHT!!
This stunning & spacious first floor north facing apartment flooded with light & perfectly situated at the rear of this boutique (8 only) apartment building facing Little Wellington Street - offers a quiet and spacious living environment with a terrific lifestyle location close to every inner city attraction. The modern & newly built apartment showcases a unique buying opportunity - security intercom entrance, 2 bedrooms (both with built in robes), modern bathroom & separate laundry, stylish open plan kitchen, spacious living & dining zones opening to a private, extra-large north facing terrace with great views. Also include is a secure under cover car park - 1 car & storage cage! Conveniently positioned close to Smith St & Gertrude St shops/cafes, transport and only moments to East Melb, Fitzroy Gardens & CBD. If you are looking for a smart investment or stylish inner city apartment that offers so much more than most other apartments on the market - then take a look now! Note: Potential rental - $550 per week or $2383 pcm approx.
Features: Split system Reverse cycle cooling and heating.

Description:
INNER CITY RETREAT
A great feature of this inner city home is its location close to the lifestyle of Smith and Brunswick streets, a step away from trendy cafes, boutiques and restaurants.
This modern single story double fronted terrace has been renovated five years ago, but has potential to build higher, extend, or to completely transform to your personal taste.
Features :-
Two double bedrooms, one with BIR and its own attached bath and toilet.
A fully fitted out garage as extra bedroom or office/studio- with shelving for storage, new flooring, wall heater and skylight.
Double glazing through -out the home .
Cosy lounge with gas heating.
Bright open plan kitchen/dining area leading out to decking and a private back garden ideal for entertaining.
If you love the inner city vibe, with all it has to offer, this home is for you!

Description:
Calling All Canny Investors
Securely let at $1,694 per calendar month, this spacious 1-bedroom apartment enjoys a surprisingly private and peaceful setting towards the rear of the block, belying its convenient city-side position with fantastic amenities in the immediate vicinity. With spacious open living area leading to the large private terrace, ideal for entertaining under the stars. A tiled kitchen features stainless steel appliances and a dishwasher, while the generous bathroom includes a walk-in shower and Euro laundry. There is a secure basement car space and lift access to ensure easy day-to-day living, with trams, North Richmond Train Station, East Melbourne gardens and a multitude of dining options along Victoria St all around the corner.

Description:
UNDERSTATED COLLINGWOOD COOL
This 1900s freestanding Victorian terrace sits in the middle of one of Melbourne's oldest suburbs. With a charming weatherboard exterior and modern but spacious interior, its architecturally designed characteristics make for an understated residence in this location. While each room makes use of every inch, the secluded backyard surrounded by an established garden and paved courtyard, is designed for easy outdoor entertaining. The naturally lit artist studio towards the back is an ideal place to let your thoughts run free.
With ample natural light, plenty of storage space, this is the perfect home for any creative couple or modern family seeking an inner-urban lifestyle. Offering a flexible floor plan, three large bedrooms and/or fourth bedroom or addition living, two bathrooms, open plan living and dining, concealed laundry, open fire place, individual split-system air conditioning, off-street parking and entertainers kitchen is perfect for any occasion.
Collingwood is well-known for its trendy restaurant scene, cool cafes, great shopping, and easy access to public transportation. Only 3km from the CBD, walking distance to Brunswick Street, Smith Street, Collingwood Children's Farm and the historic Abbotsford Convent you'll live life to the fullest.
Insights: 24 other 3 bedroom house in COLLINGWOOD have recently been sold.

Description:
LOCATED CLOSE TO EVERYTHING THAT DRAWS A BUYER TO THE INNER NORTH
With Smith, Gertrude and Brunswick Streets just moments away, this wide brick Edwardian home offers easy living in a vibrant pocket of Collingwood. Comprises 2 generously sized bedrooms each with BIR, 2 living zones, modern bathroom, contemporary kitchen, additional roof storage, and the benefit of ROW with potential for off-street parking for up to 2 cars. A superb lifestyle opportunity with little work to be done and ready for immediate enjoyment - or a brilliant investment in Collingwood.

Description:
Smart Sophisticate With Northern Terrace
Inner urban living just got smarter! Literally moments from Gertrude, Brunswick and Smith Streets, this sensational boutique apartment offers contemporary two bedroom, two bathroom spaces over two light filled levels. Positioned on the first floor of this peaceful low rise block, open plan living and dining zones and a chic, stone appointed kitchen are brilliantly lit by a sunny northern focus taken full advantage of by a private alfresco terrace amid the rooftop view. Upstairs, two double bedrooms with built-in-robes share one of two designer bathrooms, the main bedroom with ensuite access. Includes timber floors, video intercom security, reverse cycle heating/cooling, remote basement car space and storage cage.
Belinda Lindsay : 0409 853 769

Description:
Style, sophistication & a happening location
Perfectly matched to its happening locale - near trams, Smith St & myriad amenities - this dynamic 2-bedroom (BIRs) apartment stylishly complements contemporary living while providing a relaxing retreat. Meticulously designed to maximise space, & with a pleasing interior decor, the home includes open living room (rev-cyc A/C) with thoughtfully designed kitchen (wenge-look cabinetry, s/s appliances, & a breakfast bar). Sliding doors lead to a balcony with rooftop vistas. But that's not all! There's a communal rooftop area, security entry, chic bathroom/laundry, basement carpark, intercom entry, & more...
Benjamin Dax : 0408 560 790
